title: venkaTa shhaila
sahitya:
venkaTa shaila vihArA nIvE 



gati brOva rArA shrI (venkaTa)







anupallavi







pankaja bhava surapatinuta 



caranA kinkara sankula sankaTa



haraNA shrI (venkaTa)











caraNam 1







viNTininE nI varaguNa kadalanu vInulakentO Anandamuga



kaNTini kirini gOpuramula maNimaya maNTapamulanu nI



baNTuDanaiti nI (venkaTa)







caraNam 2







Emani delpudu nIdu mahatvamu sAmaja varadA nI sari galadA



prEmatO jalanu nI nAma bhajanamula vEmaru balkucu vEDucunnAnu



shrI (venkaTa)







caraNam 3







dina dinamunu pada vanajamulaku prArthanulu 



cellincuTaku ghanamuganu



dhana kanaka mani bhUSanamula tama shiramunanu vahinci



kommanucu gAcEru shrI (venkaTa)







caraNam 4







tAmasamEla nI dAsula brOva tAmarasAkSi nI daya rAdA



kAmita phala dAyakuDani birudu prakhyAti vahincina nIku Emi



parAku shrI (venkaTa)







caraNam 5







kOriti nI pada vArijamula jEriti nIdu sannidhi sadA



mAra janakanada kumaruni brOva bhAramA nIkidi tAraka nAma



shrI (venkaTa)
